answerText: allotropes [or allotropy][10] This soft allotrope of carbon consists of layered sheets of carbon arranged in a honeycomb lattice. It is used to make pencil lead.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 4 | 10 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: In phosphorus, these entities include red, black, and highly flammable white forms.  [10] Give this term for different structural forms that an element can take. Those of oxygen include diatomic oxygen and ozone.
